The Ski bombing helmet speakers from Unigear are what makes music sound
incredible. You can blast music through your Ski Bombing helmet speakers all
day long. With the built-in Bluetooth 5.0 technology, you can connect the Ski
bombing helmet to your Bluetooth devices with ease. It has proprietary HDR
audio tech that allows you to enjoy the audio experience without compromising
on sound quality. The Ski Bombing helmet speakers also come with a loud volume
and a larger battery life to play music for 10 hours on a full battery.

These are the best speakers for winter sports, snowboarding, skiing, and
outdoors. You can enjoy your favorite music all day long with these Bluetooth
speakers, regardless of whether you are on a mountain or on a city street.

Share Share on Facebook Tweet Tweet on Twitter Pin it Pin on Pinterest

Compatible with most skiing helmet

Built in microphone

Glove friendly button

## Simple，Sensible，Reliable

Stay connected with excellent audio quality, durability and a comfortable fit
under extreme weather

**True Wireless & Bluetooth 5.0**

**Glove-friendly Button System**

**Proprietary HDR Audio Tech**

Play Video

### Features

  * True Wireless& Bluetooth 5.0: Stay connected no matter how much you shake your head or jump up and down.
  * Glove-friendly button system: Easy control button allows accurately press the button with ski snow gloves. Play or pause tracks or take calls with voice control through the button.
  * Proprietary HDR audio tech: Our HDR audio tech and 40mm high-efficiency drivers combine to deliver a premium acoustic experience. 
  * Louder volume & extended battery life: Surprisingly loud, the Snowboarding Headphones help you reduce the sound of the wind. Also, it can play for 10 hours on a full battery, covers you with music all day long.

### Technical Specs

Best Use | Winter Sports/Skiing/Outdoor  
---|---  
Texture | Aero-metal + Lithium Battery  
Shell Material | ABS + PP (Flame Retardant)  
Battery | 165mAh x 2  
Bluetooth | 5.0  
Charging Time | 1.5 Hrs  
Working Hrs | 10-11Hrs (Tested at temperature of 20℃)  
Dimensions | 5.3 x 1.72cm  
Water Resistance | IPX4  
Weight | 0.1543lbs / 0.07kg  
What's Included | 1x Earphone , 1x Storage Bag, 1x Power Line, 1x Adapter, 1x
Product Instruction  
Warranty | Unconditional return & replacement in 30 days

Kyle Small

12/05/2023

**100% unsatisfied with product and service.**

Upon receiving product, I realized they offer very poor quality products. The
charger for the headphones I ordered wont stay connected. When I contacted
customer service to do a return they said the would solve the problem as soon
as possible and to contact them with any further questions. Since November
19,2023 I have been completely ignored!!!! Now I am really upset with the lack
of customer service, business ethics and professionalism. I DO NOT RECOMMEND
ORDERING ANYTHING FROM THIS WEBSITE!

Zero star rating.

10

Charles Zwirba

C

11/28/2023

**Best BANG for the buck**

I purchased these audio chips for my ski helmet and have been using them
almost daily for the past 2 seasons. They sound as good as I need them to
sound, answers calls with ease, microphone seems to work loud and clear. I
couldn't have asked for a better set of audio chips and the low price is just
a bonus. $230 cost from the nearest competitor compared to the $79 that I paid
for these, I'll take that deal every time. They also come with some great
customer service, I received a response to a question from them in under
24hrs. After 2 seasons of daily use the left speaker (happened only once)
wasn't pairing with the right speaker, after instructions from the tech
support, they work perfect again.

00
